scripts.copy-server: mkdir -p dist/GameVault/server && SOURCE_DIR="$(pwd)/../dist/GameVault/server" && if [ -d "$SOURCE_DIR" ]; then cp -r "$SOURCE_DIR"/* dist/GameVault/server/ && echo 'Server files copied successfully from' "$SOURCE_DIR"; else echo 'Error: Server files not found at' "$SOURCE_DIR"; ls -la "$(pwd)/../dist/GameVault/" 2>&1 || true; exit 1; fi
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
